name: Chronicles (chinese)
description: Chinese translation of Heroes Chronicles. Before using this mod please confirm that you have created the mod 'Heroes Chronicles' via 'Heroes Chronicles: All Chapters' GOG installer.

chinese.name: 英雄无敌历代记（中文)
chinese.description: 《英雄无敌历代记》的中文翻译。使用该模组前请确认您已经通过“Heroes Chronicles: All Chapters”的GOG installer创建了“Heroes Chronicles”模组。
